dashboard.viewedPreviewSuccess: Thank you! Your profile preview has been marked as viewed.

tabContent.noQuestionnaire: Your questionnaire is the key to finding a deep connection. It hasn't been started yet.

checklist.welcome: Welcome, {{firstName}}! Let's create a profile that truly tells your story.
checklist.welcome_female: Welcome, {{firstName}}! Let's create a profile that truly tells your story.
checklist.allComplete: Excellent work, {{firstName}}! Your profile is complete and ready to shine.
checklist.allComplete_female: Excellent work, {{firstName}}! Your profile is complete and ready to shine.
checklist.welcomeSubtitle: Completing these steps is the key to unlocking meaningful, high-quality matches.
checklist.allCompleteSubtitle: You've completed all the steps. A rich, detailed profile is essential for finding your best match.
checklist.checklistPurpose: This checklist outlines the necessary steps to build a standout profile that attracts the best possible matches for you.
checklist.missingItemsTitle: What’s next to complete this step?

missingItems.medicalInfoDetails: Details for medical info (when 'Yes' is selected)
missingItems.aliyaYear: Year of Aliyah (when country is specified)
missingItems.childrenFromPreviousReference: Reference to children from a previous relationship
missingItems.preferredHeadCoverings: Preferred head covering types (for men's preference)

aiAdvisor.triggerButton: Get AI Analysis & Tips to Improve Your Profile
aiAdvisor.dialogDescription: AI-powered analysis to help you present your best self and attract more compatible matches.
aiAdvisor.loadingTitle: Our AI is analyzing your profile...
aiAdvisor.loadingDescription: This may take a few moments. Thank you for your patience.
aiAdvisor.errorAlertDescription: We couldn't complete the profile analysis at this time. Please try again later.
aiAdvisor.initialState: Click the button to begin the analysis.

summary.myPersonalityDescription: How our AI understands your personality based on your profile and answers.
summary.lookingForTitle: Who Am I Looking For? (AI Summary)
summary.lookingForDescription: A summary of your preferences for your ideal partner.

completeness.title: Profile Completeness Report
completeness.description: An overview of the sections you've completed and those that could use a little more detail.

tips.title: Personalized Recommendations
tips.description: Actionable tips to enhance your profile and attract higher-quality matches.

photosSection.title: Your Profile Photos
photosSection.subtitle: Upload up to {{maxImages}} photos. Your first photo will be your main profile picture.

emptyState.title: No photos yet
emptyState.description: Photos are the first chapter of your story. Upload a few to make a great first impression.

emptyStateDisabled.title: No photos have been uploaded for this profile.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Photo Deletion
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this photo? This action cannot be undone.

toasts.maxImagesError: You have reached the maximum number of photos.
toasts.slotsError: You can only upload {{count}} more photos.
toasts.uploadError: An error occurred while uploading photos.
toasts.selectOneError: Please select at least one photo to delete.
toasts.bulkDeleteError: An error occurred while deleting photos.
toasts.singleDeleteError: An error occurred while deleting the photo.
toasts.setMainError: An error occurred while updating the main photo.

confirmations.bulkDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected photos? This action is irreversible.

header.title: Personal Profile
header.subtitleEdit: Edit your profile details to best reflect who you are.

religion.title: Religion & Lifestyle
religion.influentialRabbiPlaceholder: Share a figure who has influenced you and how...

about.title: About Me & More
about.headlinePlaceholder: A single sentence that captures your essence...

headlineEmpty.title: Your headline is the opening line to your story.
headlineEmpty.subtitle: A short, meaningful example:
headlineEmpty.example: "Seeking a simple connection to build something real."

about.aboutPlaceholder: Describe yourself, what makes you unique, and what's important to you...
about.inspiringCouplePlaceholder: Who is the couple and what do you admire about their relationship...
about.privateNotesPlaceholder: Anything else you feel is important for your matchmaker to know...

medical.title: Sensitive & Medical Information
medical.tooltip: This information is confidential and for matchmakers only. It will not be displayed on your profile by default.
medical.description: We believe healthy relationships are built on integrity and responsibility. This section allows you to discreetly share relevant information (physical or mental) to help us find the most suitable matches and prevent any discomfort later on.
medical.hasInfoLabel: Is there any sensitive or medical information the team should be aware of?
medical.detailsPlaceholder: This is a safe space to share. Examples: chronic illness, mental health journey, fertility matters, or anything else you feel is important to mention.
medical.timingLabel: When would you prefer this to be shared with a match (mediated by the matchmaker)?

visibilityToggle.visible: A notice will be visible on your profile

visibilityDescription.visible: Your profile will indicate that there is sensitive information to discuss.
visibilityDescription.hidden: This information will remain completely confidential for matchmaker use only.

tooltips.headline: Write one catchy sentence that sums you up or what you're looking for. e.g., 'Engineer by day, dreamer by night.'
tooltips.about: This is your place to shine! Tell us about yourself freely: what you do, significant milestones, and of course, your personality. A minimum of {{count}} characters helps create a richer picture.
tooltips.inspiringCouple: Think of a couple (from your life, history, etc.) whose relationship inspires you. What do you learn from them about partnership?
tooltips.influentialRabbi: Tell us about a figure (rabbi, thinker, teacher) who has shaped your worldview. This helps us understand your spiritual and intellectual side.
tooltips.privateNotes: Share anything important for us to know that you don't want on your public profile. e.g., sensitive topics, very specific preferences, or additional background.

toasts.aboutMinLength: The 'About Me' field must contain at least {{count}} characters.

religiousLevel.secular_traditional_connection: Secular with a connection to tradition

religiousJourney.BORN_INTO_CURRENT_LIFESTYLE: Grew up in a similar religious environment
religiousJourney.BORN_SECULAR: Grew up in a secular environment
religiousJourney.IN_PROCESS: In a process of spiritual exploration

medicalTiming.FROM_THE_START: From the beginning (recommended for significant topics)
medicalTiming.AFTER_FIRST_DATES: After the first or second date
medicalTiming.IN_COORDINATION_ONLY: Only via a personal call with me first

emptyState.title: No questionnaire has been filled out for this profile.
emptyState.subtitle: There are no answers to display.

noAnswersState.title: The questionnaire is not yet complete.
noAnswersState.subtitle: You can continue filling it out to see your answers here.

questionCard.languageTooltip: תשובה זו נכתבה במקור בשפה המוצגת

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this answer? This action cannot be undone.

editing.visible: Make private (visible only to you and matchmakers)
editing.hidden: Make visible (will be shown to potential matches)

viewing.visible: This answer is visible to potential matches.
viewing.hidden: This answer is private and only visible to matchmakers.

placeholders.storyWaiting: A story waiting to be discovered

booleanPrefs.shomerYes: Yes, this is important to me

header.excitementQuote: Every love story begins with one special meeting...

content.emptyStateDescription: It seems this candidate hasn't filled out this part of their profile yet. A great opportunity to discover together!
content.deepDivePersonality: A Deep Dive into My Personality
content.moreAnswersPersonality: More answers that help you get to know me
content.familyThatShapedMe: The family and roots that shaped me

content.answersOnLoveAndFamily: Answers to questions on love, family, and everything in between
content.whatHelpsFindConnection: Things that can help us find the right connection
content.moreAnswersAboutPartner: More answers about what I'm looking for
content.professionalDetails: Professional details for the matchmaking process
content.emptyPrefsTitle: Open to meeting the right person
content.emptyPrefsDescription: There's no checklist here, but an open invitation to meet a special person. There's room for exciting discoveries together.

focus.importantDetails: The important details at a glance
focus.traitsAndHobbies: The traits and hobbies that make me unique
focus.moreToDiscover: There are many more interesting things to discover...
focus.letsGetToKnow: Let's Get to Know Each Other Better

availabilityStatus.dialogDescription: Let us know your current status so we can provide you with the most relevant suggestions.
availabilityStatus.notePlaceholder: e.g., 'Available again on Sunday', 'Only looking for serious matches'

cardHeader.title: Account Settings
cardHeader.description: Manage your account, privacy, and security details.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: The name and email associated with your account.

marketing.title: Communication Preferences
marketing.label: Receive marketing information and updates
marketing.description: Get updates about events, new features, and news from NeshamaTech.

security.title: Security & Password
security.description: Manage your password and account security.
security.managedExternally: Your password is managed by an external authentication provider.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Deleting your account is a permanent action and will remove all of your data.

cardFooter.notice: Your account details are protected in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

toasts.fillAllFieldsDesc: All fields are required to change your password.
toasts.passwordsMismatchDesc: Please ensure the new password is the same in both fields.
toasts.passwordValidationDesc: Please ensure your new password meets all requirements.
toasts.sendVerificationDesc: Please try again later or contact support.
toasts.initiatePasswordDesc: The current password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
toasts.verificationCodeDesc: Please enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
toasts.invalidVerificationCodeDesc: The verification code must be 6 digits.
toasts.passwordUpdateSuccessDesc: Your new password is now active.
toasts.passwordUpdateDesc: The verification code may be incorrect or has expired.
toasts.invalidDeleteConfirmationDesc: Please type '{{phrase}}' exactly to confirm deletion.
toasts.deleteSuccessDesc: We're sorry to see you go. You are being redirected.
toasts.deleteErrorDesc: Please try again later or contact support.

passwordDialog.title: Change Password
passwordDialog.description: Update your account password for added security.
passwordDialog.verificationDescription: For your security, please enter the 6-digit code sent to your email to confirm this change.
passwordDialog.noticeDescription: For your security, after verifying your current password, a 6-digit code will be sent to your email to confirm this change.
passwordDialog.verificationCodePlaceholder: Enter the 6-digit code from your email
passwordDialog.tokenLifetime: The verification code is valid for 24 hours.
passwordDialog.noCodeAlertDescription: Please check your inbox and spam folder. If you still can't find it, you can try starting the process again.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Account Deletion
deleteDialog.description: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data, including your profile, matches, and messages. This cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.mismatchWarning: The text you entered does not match.
